title: Hilton Escape in Myanmar’s Capital City with Nightly Dinners & Cocktails
description: Enjoy a Hilton getaway to Myanmar’s capital (and largest) city. Spanning 4,800sqkm, Nay Pyi Taw is six times the size of New York City and is a frequent stop for business travellers and golf aficionados. Spend three nights at the Hilton Nay Pyi Taw and receive daily buffet breakfast, nightly a la carte dinners, a nightly cocktail for two and two 60-minute Myanmar massages to share at the Hilton spa.
offer_address: JV-001 Taw Win Thiri Road, Naypyitaw 15011, Myanmar (Burma)
